## WishlistItemInput interface

Defines the items to add to a wish list

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WishlistItemInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [entered\_options?](./magento-api.wishlistiteminput.entered_options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[EnteredOptionInput](./magento-api.enteredoptioninput.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of options that the customer entered |
|  [parent\_sku?](./magento-api.wishlistiteminput.parent_sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> For complex product types, the SKU of the parent product |
|  [quantity](./magento-api.wishlistiteminput.quantity.md) | Scalars\['Float'\] | The amount or number of items to add |
|  [selected\_options?](./magento-api.wishlistiteminput.selected_options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;Scalars\['ID'\]&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of strings corresponding to options the customer selected |
|  [sku](./magento-api.wishlistiteminput.sku.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The SKU of the product to add. For complex product types, specify the child product SKU |
